tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The sanitisation was done properly and all the physical distancing measures were taken. I didn’t have to wait for longer. All the doctors and assistants were friendly and extremely sweet.
For my dental check-up, Dr. Seema suggested to massage my gums and do gargles instead of advising to get any kind of treatment done, which is usually the case at other dental clinic I’ve visited before.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My father is diabetic and heart patient and was wearing denture but wasn't able to have food. Our heart doctor recommended dr.seema. she explained us everything thoroughly. My father got implants done last year and now crowns. He is so happy that he can chew food properly and smile. We highly recommend dr.seema. Visit her once with your dental issue, she will give you genuine advice *** ****** **********
Thank you Dr.

She's very friendly and an approachable person. My front teeth was not in an order. I had a smiling problem. She explained the treatment in a very nice manner and solved my problem within a few weeks. I'm very happy and I would like to encourage you all to get an appointment with her. ***** *** *****
reply_text: Thank you :). I m happy to give you smile you wanted.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I m a cancer patient. I had bad experience earlier with other dentist. So i was scared to get dental treatment done because of my health issues. But after talking to dr.seema, i felt relaxed. I got rct done without pain. I recommend her to other patients. I and my husband are visiting her since 3years. Thank you Dr.Seema
reply_text: Thanks mam for your trust on me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent behaviour. Very very hardworking , cost effective, explain well, she solves the problem by working very hard . Give more than required and sufficient timing. Available on WhatsApp.do everything possible to solve problem . Rare Bread of doctors who treat for her self satisfaction and cures . Not after money . Always available for post services even after many months and years. As her patient our Satisfaction level is very high. My family and friends are her patient.

I visited the doctor 2years back for my cavity filling..then recently visited Fortis hospital for my wisdom tooth extraction..Dr. Seema is very patient friendly and responsive doctor which i like most...as i was very nervous during the procedure she continuously boost up my confidence...and the procedure was very smooth...after one day of my extraction i called her 2times for some queries related to my problem and she answered very politely..thankew Dr.Seema
reply_text: Thank you and I am happy that I was able to help you.

review: The doctor in our home town told my aunty that they have to pull out all her teeth. But our family nurse from fortis introduced us to Dr Seema, she did the implant for my aunty. Now she can eat whatever she likes. We are very glad to came to dr Seema. Once she put the implant teeth my aunty have no complain about any pain.The dr is very professional and hard working, she made the teeth look very natural, really a true artist I can say.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words mam. I m glad that you are happy with treatment :)
